Card Set up
Let's get your card
set up..
There are so many ways you can use the Matbia card to give.
Customize your preferred settings, and stay ahead of your maaser
Set Up My Card
Card didn’t arrive? Please call us at 877-762-8242 or email info@matbia.com so we can get you sorted. 
Maximize your card’s giving abilities,
by setting each of your card corners with one of the options below.
Preset Amount — Fast and easy
set a dollar amount you’ll give each time this corner is tapped
Manual Entry — Most flexible
tap this corner to donate however much you wish
-  just like you would do with a credit card
Digital Envelope — I’ll think about it
tapping this corner will send a donation request to your portal
User Cap — For the regulars
use this corner for your repeat collectors, so you can keep giving, with a limit.    
Mystery Donation — B’yedei Shamayim
Tap this corner to generate a random donation amount. (You’ll set a minimum and maximum donation in advance.) 
Best regards,

The Matbia Team
